title: Muonphilic asymmetric dark matter at a future muon collider
summary: We explore phenomenological constraints on, and future muon collider sensitivities to, the parameter spaces of various muonphilic portals to fermionic asymmetric dark matter (ADM). Both WEFT-level dimension-6 effective operators and two UV models based on gauged $L_μ- L_τ$ are considered. One of the latter features a vector coupling to the dark matter and the other an axial vector coupling.
